rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}

unitName: Issues in politics, governance and research
description: This is an Honours unit that reflects on research ethics and methods in political studies, and then investigates some of the core issues in debates about governance including the capacity of executive power to make effective policy, the role of the legislature, how interests may be mediated, and what challenges confront supranational governance.
